org.onehippo.forge.content.pojo.model

Class BinaryValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.onehippo.forge.content.pojo.model.BinaryValue

  • public class BinaryValue
extends Object
    Non-serializable, transient Binary data value abstraction.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BinaryValue()
      Default constructor.
      BinaryValue(byte[] data)
      Constructor with binary data in byte array, which is used to build a data: URL string.
      BinaryValue(byte[] data, String mediaType, String charset)
      Constructor with binary data in byte array, which is used to build a data: URL string, mediaType and charset, when the data represents character based data.
      BinaryValue(org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileObject fileObject)
      Constructor with a FileObject instance representing an external data file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispose()
      Disposes the transient input stream and the internal file object if any.
      static BinaryValue fromDataURI(String dataUri)
      Converts the given dataUri which is supposed to be a data: URL to a BinaryValue object.
      String getCharset()
      Returns the character set
      String getMediaType()
      Returns the media type.
      InputStream getStream()
      Creates and returns a transient input stream from the underlying data.
      void setCharset(String charset)
      Sets the character set
      void setMediaType(String mediaType)
      Sets the media type
      static String toDataURI(byte[] data, String mediaType, String charset)
      Converts the data in mediaType and charset to a data: URL string.
      String toUriString()
      Returns a URI representation of the underlying data.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public String toUriString()
                   throws IOException
        Returns a URI representation of the underlying data. Either a data: URL or an external URL based on an internal FileObject.

      • fromDataURI

        public static BinaryValue fromDataURI(String dataUri)
        Converts the given dataUri which is supposed to be a data: URL to a BinaryValue object.
        Parameters:
        dataUri - a data: URL
        Returns:
        a BinaryValue object converted from the given dataUri

      • toDataURI

        public static String toDataURI(byte[] data,
                               String mediaType,
                               String charset)
        Converts the data in mediaType and charset to a data: URL string.
        Parameters:
        data - binary data in byte array
        mediaType - media type
        charset - character set
        Returns:
        a data: URL string converted from the given data.
